review: My daughter in law had one and I liked it.  So I decided to get one and I love it!
author: Dee

review: Very easy to install and exactly what I wanted.  Works great!
author: Vicki Barneck

review: Came with someone else's account info loaded and I don't know how to change! Other than that, ok...I think Apple Tv may be better...
author: Susana

review: once I get it to working I am sure it will be fine.  Very long call with customer service, trying to figure out what the problem could be.
author: Marie Anderson

review: So far I am loving this.  I was using the Wii to watch netflix but this is so much easier.
author: Jennifer

review: I've only started using it, and it's already put my smart tv features to shame. I bought a TV with no smart features. So I got this, and it's the best!  It's easy to install and super easy to use. I highly recommend this to anyone!
author: Annmarie Pine

review: This stick was Great! It it the second Roku divice I have home. Easy to set up and works as described.
author: Chifan7
